title: Van Sampenga Mogga Studs: Emerald and Diamond Petal Earrings
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) with Hyderabadi Polish. Features natural Emeralds (Panche Ratnalu) in a teardrop cut and brilliant-cut Diamonds (Vajralu).
features: Inspired by the fragrant Sampenga flower (Magnolia champaca), these studs boast a floral design with emerald petals surrounding a central diamond cluster. The gold framework is meticulously crafted with openwork detailing and milgrain edging for an added touch of elegance. Setting: Pave and prong setting.
colors: Predominantly gold with the vibrant green of Emeralds and the brilliance of colorless diamonds.
occasions: or as a treasured gift for anniversaries and birthdays. Suitable for both traditional and contemporary attire.
description: A timeless piece that embodies elegance and grace. The Sampenga flower symbolizes purity and prosperity, making these earrings a meaningful addition to your jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster and ensures lasting beauty. The combination of emeralds and diamonds represents harmony and balance.
